aspguidp.service.data.manager

Interface DataManager

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AtomConsumer, AtomSupplier
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    EntityDataManager, ValueDataManager
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    SimpleEntityDataManager, SimpleValueDataManager

    public interface DataManager
extends AtomSupplier, AtomConsumer
    Interface for a data manager.

    A data manager is responsible for managing an arbitrary number of Entity instances. This is used by the input and output components of the application, to store access the data which is inputted by the user or outputted to the user (InputElementController, OutputElementController).

    The data manager interface extends the AtomSupplier interface and the AtomConsumer interface. This enables to register the data manager of an input component as an atom supplier to the input atom hub of the application (AtomHub). Therefore, the entities which are managed by the data manager are passed to the logic program solver on logic program execution. Also, this enables to register the data manager of an output component as an atom consumer to the output atom hub of the application. Therefore, the atoms of the currently displayed answer set are passed to the data manager and can be outputted to the user in the respective output component.

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from interface aspguidp.service.core.atom.AtomSupplier

        getAtoms

      • Methods inherited from interface aspguidp.service.core.atom.AtomConsumer

        setAtoms
